summary: 1995 NISSAN MAXIMA EXPERIENCING OIL LEAK.  *MR  THERE WAS A PRE-EXISTING OIL LEAK.  THE ENGINE LIGHT HAD COME ON IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS PICKED UP.  THE DEALER PROMISED THE CONSUMER A NEW BATTERY BUT THEY CLEANED OFF THE BATTERY ACID AND SAID THAT IS WAS NEW.  AFTER ABOUT THREE WEEKS A NEW BATTERY WAS PLACED IN AFTER SEVERAL NO STARTS.  THE DEALER STATED THE ALTERNATOR WAS BAD.  *SCC  *JB
